chapter.text: 51|1|shapath hai (baadalon ko) bikherane vaaliyon kee
51|2|phir (baadalon ka) bojh laadane vaaliyon kee
51|3|phir dheemee gati se chalane vaaliyon kee
51|4|phir (allaah ka) aadesh baantane vaale (farishton kee)
51|5|nishchay jis (pralay) se tumhen daraaya ja raha hai, vah sachchee hai.
51|6|tatha karmon ka phal avashy milane vaala hai.
51|7|shapath hai raaston vaale aakaash kee
51|8|vaastav mein, tum vibhinn[1] baaton mein ho.
51|9|usase vahee pher diya jaata hai, jo (saty se) phira hua ho.
51|10|naash kar diye gaye anumaan lagaane vaale.
51|11|jo apanee achetana mein bhoole hue hain.
51|12|ve prashn[1] karate hain ki pratikaar ka din kab hai
51|13|(us din hai) jis din vah agni par tapaaye jaayenge.
51|14|(unase kaha jaayegaah) svaad chakho apane upadrav ka. yahee vah hai, jisakee tum sheeghr maang kar rahe the.
51|15|vaastav mein, aagyaakaaree svargon tatha jal sroton mein honge.
51|16|lete hue jo kuchh pradaan kiya hai unahen, unake paalanahaaran ne. vastutah, ve isase pahale (sansaar mein) sadaachaaree the.
51|17|ve raatri mein bahut kam soya karate the.
51|18|tatha bhoron[1] mein kshama maangate the.
51|19|aur unake dhanon mein maangane vaale[1] tatha na paane vaale ka haqa tha.
51|20|tatha dharatee mein bahut-see nishaaniyaan hain vishvaas karane vaalon ke lie.
51|21|tatha svayan tumhaare bheetar (bhee). phir kyon tum dekhate nahin
51|22|aur aakaash mein tumhaaree jeevika[1] hai tatha jisaka tumhen vachan diya ja raha hai.
51|23|to shapath hai aakaash evan dharatee ke paalanahaar kee! ye (baat) aise hee sach hai, jaise tum bol rahe ho.
51|24|(he nabee!) kya aayee aapake paas ibraaheem ke sammaanit atithiyon kee soochana
51|25|jab ve aaye usake paas, to salaam kiya. ibraaheem ne (bhee) salaam kiya (tatha kahaah) aparichit log hain.
51|26|phir chupake se apane parijanon kee or gaya aur ek mota (bhuna hua) bachhada laaya.
51|27|phir rakh diya unake paas, usane kahaah tum kyon nahin khaate ho
51|28|phir apane dil mein unase kuchh dara, unhonne kahaah daro nahin aur use shubh soochana dee ek gyaanee putr kee.
51|29|to saamane aayee usakee patnee aur usane maar liya (aashchary se) apane munh par haath tatha kahaah main baanjh budhiya hoon.
51|30|unhonne kahaah isee prakaar, tere paalanahaar ne kaha hai. vaastav mein, vah sab gun aur sab kuchh jaanane vaala hai.
51|31|us (ibraaheem) ne kahaah to tumhaara kya abhiyaan hai, he bheje hue (farishto)
51|32|unhonne kahaah vaastav mein, ham bheje gaye hain ek apareedhee jaati kee or.
51|33|taaki ham barasaayen unapar patthar kee kankaree.
51|34|naamaankit[1] tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se ullanghanakaariyon ke lie.
51|35|phir hamane nikaal diya jo bhee us (bastee) mein eemaan vaale the.
51|36|aur hamane usamen mominon ka keval ek hee ghar[1] paaya.
51|37|tatha chhod dee hamane us (bastee) mein ek nishaanee unake lie, jo darate hon duhkhadaayee yaatana se.
51|38|tatha moosa (kee katha) mein, jab hamane bheja use firaun kee or pratyaksh (khule) pramaan ke saath.
51|39|to vah vimukh ho gaya apane bal-boote ke kaaran aur kah diya ki jaadoogar athava paagal hai.
51|40|antatah, hamane pakad liya usako tatha usakee senaon ko, phir phenk diya unhen saagar mein aur vah nindit hokar rah gaya.
51|41|tatha aad mein (shikshaaprad nishaanee hai). jab hamane bhej dee unapar baanjh[1] aandhee.
51|42|vah nahin chhodatee thee kisee vastu ko jisapar guzaratee, parantu use bana detee thee jeern choor-choor haddee ke samaan.
51|43|tatha samood mein jab unase kaha gaya ki laabhaanvit ho lo, ek nishchit samay tak.
51|44|to unhonne avagya kee apane paalanahaar ke aadesh kee, to sahasa pakad liya unhen kadak ne aur ve dekhate rah gaye.
51|45|to ve na khade ho sake aur na (hamase) badala le sake.
51|46|tatha nooh[1] kee jaati ko isase pahale (yaad karo). vaastav mein, ve avagyaakaaree jaati the.
51|47|tatha aakaash ko hamane banaaya hai haathon[1] se aur ham nishchay vistaar karane vaale hain.
51|48|tatha dharatee ko hamane bichhaaya hai, to ham kya[1] hee achchhe bichhaane vaale hain.
51|49|tatha pratyek vastu ko hamane utpann kiya hai joda, taaki tum shiksha grahan karo.
51|50|to tum daudo allaah kee or, vaastav mein, main tumhen usakee or se pratyaksh roop se (khula) saavadhaan kar ne vaala hoon.
51|51|aur mat banao allaah ke saath koee doosara poojy. vaastav mein, main tumhen isase khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon.
51|52|isee prakaar nahin aaya unake paas jo in (makka vaasiyon) se poorv rahe koee rasool, parantu unhonne kaha ki jaadoogar ya paagal hai.
51|53|kya ve ek-doosare ko vasiyyat[1] kar chuke hain isakee? balki ve ullanghanakaaree log hain.
51|54|to aap mukh pher len unase. aapakee koee ninda nahin hai.
51|55|aur aap shiksha dete rahen. isalie ki shiksha laabhaprad hai imaan vaalon ke lie.
51|56|aur nahin utpann kiya hai mainne jinn tatha manushy ko, parantu taaki meree hee ibaadat karen.
51|57|main nahin chaahata hoon unase koee jeevika aur na chaahata hoon ki ve mujhe khilaayen.
51|58|avashy allaah hee jeevika daata, shaktishaalee, balavaan hai.
51|59|to in atyaachaariyon ke paap hain inake saathiyon ke paapon ke samaan, atah utaavale na banen.
51|60|antatah, vinaash hai kaafiron ke lie unake us din[1] se, jisase he daraaye ja rahe hain.
